fluid.description: Object used to define parameters related to the circulation fluid.

grout.description: Object used to define parameters related to grout material.

soil.description: Object used to define parameters related to soil material.

pipe.description: Object used to define parameters related the pipes.

borehole.description: Object used to define parameters related the borehole.

simulation.description: Object used to define parameters related to simulation.

geometric_constraints.description:
Object used to define geometric constraint parameters for

the selected design algorithm.

design.description: Object used to define parameters related to design and sizing.

loads.description: Object used to define loads for design and sizing.
